timeline.bodyText: This is probably too long for a lamba - can you surface it out into a full function? I think within the class is still fine
timeline.author: kurtisvg

replies.bodyText: I was unsure of how to do this when the lambda used variables outside of the scope of the function, like dlpJob and done. handleMessage needs to be callable so I need to return a function. I'm not sure if there's a way to build functions using closures in Java? I ended up nesting the lambda within another function, and passing the DlpJob and Future to that function in in c634313, but that seems more complicated and less readable to me? Thoughts?
replies.author: shubha-rajan
